data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Bangalore, Karnataka, India.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bangalore, Karnataka, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Bangalore, Karnataka, India, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 105,838 believers find a person of peace today among the 9,515,762 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Bangalore to exponentially multiply disciples.
Lord, remember the Bedar Myasa people. Make the Bedar Myasa people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, fill the 105,838 believers in the county of Bangalore with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Bangalore that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Over 97.69 percent of the people of Bangalore are far from Jesus.

location.name: Bangalore
location.people_groups_list: Sardar (Hindu traditions), Bedar Kare, Vakkaliga Kunchitiga, Vakkaliga, Mundala
